entry.title: WINTER STORM WARNING , Toronto
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 04:47 AM EST Wednesday 22 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snow, -2.9°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Toronto Pearson Int'l Airport 12:00 PM EST Wednesday 22 February 2023
Condition: Light Snow
Temperature: -2.9°C
Pressure / Tendency: 102.0 kPa rising
Visibility: 24.1 km
Humidity: 89 %
Wind Chill: -8
Dewpoint: -4.4°C
Wind: ENE 15 km/h gust 31 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 3

entry.title: Wednesday: Periods of snow. High minus 1. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 60 percent chance of light snow. Snow at times heavy beginning late this afternoon. Amount 2 cm. Wind becoming northeast 30 km/h gusting to 60 early this afternoon. High minus 1. Wind chill near minus 9. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Wednesday 22 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Snow at times heavy mixed with ice pellets. Low minus 4.
entry.summary: Snow at times heavy or ice pellets with risk of freezing rain. Snow and ice pellet amount 5 to 10 cm except locally 15 cm over northern sections. Wind northeast 30 km/h gusting to 60. Low minus 4. Wind chill near minus 11. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Wednesday 22 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Periods of freezing drizzle. High zero.
entry.summary: Periods of freezing drizzle or ice pellets. Wind northeast 20 km/h. High zero. Wind chill minus 10 in the morning. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Wednesday 22 February 2023
